languages.text: "Вражеский фрегат хорошо бронирован, а еще у него есть ангар для истребителей — не пустой ни разу, конечно. Пытаться взять его на абордаж — гиблое дело, пока в строю остальные суда. Рекомендую сначала избавиться от них, после чего взяться за "Бессердечного". Когда он будет достаточно ослаблен, мы сможем пойти на сближение и начать абордаж".

"The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."
languages.original_text: "Вражеский фрегат хорошо бронирован, а еще у него есть ангар для истребителей — не пустой ни разу, конечно. Пытаться взять его на абордаж — гиблое дело, пока в строю остальные суда. Рекомендую сначала избавиться от них, после чего взяться за "Бессердечного". Когда он будет достаточно ослаблен, мы сможем пойти на сближение и начать абордаж".

traits.locale_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which sure isn't empty. So long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless. Once the frigate's been bloodied, we can close in and board it."

My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless. Once the frigate's been bloodied, we can close in and board it."

languages.text: «La fragata enemiga está fuertemente blindada y cuenta con un hangar de cazas ocupado. Mientras sus escoltas la defiendan, intentar abordar la nave sería un suicidio. Recomiendo eliminar la escolta y luego atacar a la propia Desalmada. Cuando la fragata esté dañada, podremos aproximarnos y abordarla».
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."

traits.locale_text: «La fragata enemiga está fuertemente blindada y cuenta con un hangar de cazas ocupado. Mientras sus escoltas la defiendan, intentar abordar la nave sería un suicidio. Recomiendo eliminar la escolta y luego atacar a la propia Desalmada. Cuando la fragata esté dañada, podremos aproximarnos y abordarla».

languages.text: “敌人的飞船全副武装，还配备了战斗机甲板，那他们的机库肯定也不是空的。那些战斗机飞来飞去，直接登船相当于送死。我的建议是，先干掉别的船，之后再打无心号。等把无心号打残废之后，就可以靠过去，准备登船了。”
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."

traits.locale_text: “敌人的飞船全副武装，还配备了战斗机甲板，那他们的机库肯定也不是空的。那些战斗机飞来飞去，直接登船相当于送死。我的建议是，先干掉别的船，之后再打无心号。等把无心号打残废之后，就可以靠过去，准备登船了。”

languages.text: « La frégate ennemie est lourdement armée et équipée d'une baie de lancement de chasseurs, qui sera sans nul doute bien pourvue. Tant que les vaisseaux d'escorte assureront sa défense, toute tentative d'abordage serait du suicide. Je suis d'avis de les abattre en priorité, avant d'attaquer le Sans-Cœur. Une fois la frégate endommagée, nous pourrons approcher pour l'aborder. »
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."

traits.locale_text: « La frégate ennemie est lourdement armée et équipée d'une baie de lancement de chasseurs, qui sera sans nul doute bien pourvue. Tant que les vaisseaux d'escorte assureront sa défense, toute tentative d'abordage serait du suicide. Je suis d'avis de les abattre en priorité, avant d'attaquer le Sans-Cœur. Une fois la frégate endommagée, nous pourrons approcher pour l'aborder. »

languages.text: 「敵のフリゲート艦は重装備で、戦闘機発進用の格納庫を備えています。確実に空ではないでしょう。護衛艦が周囲にいる限り、その船に乗り込もうとするのは死刑も同然です。私のアドバイスは、彼らを最初に引き剥がして、それからハートレス本体を攻撃することです。フリゲート艦にダメージを与えたら、近づいて乗り込むことができます」
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."

traits.locale_text: 「敵のフリゲート艦は重装備で、戦闘機発進用の格納庫を備えています。確実に空ではないでしょう。護衛艦が周囲にいる限り、その船に乗り込もうとするのは死刑も同然です。私のアドバイスは、彼らを最初に引き剥がして、それからハートレス本体を攻撃することです。フリゲート艦にダメージを与えたら、近づいて乗り込むことができます」

languages.text: "Düşman fırkateyni, ağır zırhlı ve savaş aracı kalkış bölmesine sahip. Refakatçiler etrafında olup sonu savunduğu sürece bordalama girişimleri erlerimizin ölümüyle sonuçlanacaktır. Tavsiyem, önce refakatçileri saf dışı bırakıp sonrasında da Taşkalp'e saldırmak. Fırkateyn hasar aldıktan sonra yaklaşıp bordalayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."

traits.locale_text: "Düşman fırkateyni, ağır zırhlı ve savaş aracı kalkış bölmesine sahip. Refakatçiler etrafında olup sonu savunduğu sürece bordalama girişimleri erlerimizin ölümüyle sonuçlanacaktır. Tavsiyem, önce refakatçileri saf dışı bırakıp sonrasında da Taşkalp'e saldırmak. Fırkateyn hasar aldıktan sonra yaklaşıp bordalayabiliriz."

languages.text: "Die feindliche Fregatte ist schwer gepanzert und hat ein Flugdeck ... das garantiert nicht leer sein wird. Solange die Geleitschiffe sie verteidigen, käme jeder Versuch, an Bord der Fregatte zu gelangen, einem Todesurteil gleich. Ich schlage vor, wir schalten zunächst die Geleitschiffe aus und greifen dann die Heartless selbst an. Sobald die Fregatte beschädigt ist, können wir an Bord gehen."
languages.original_text: "The enemy frigate is heavily armoured and boasts a fighter launch bay — which for sure won't be empty. As long as the escorts are around to defend it, trying to board the vessel would be a death sentence. My advice is to take them out first, then attack the Heartless itself. Once the frigate is damaged, we can close in and board it."
